content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Customize YARA and osquery task names December 11, 2023—During an investigation, users can run multiple rounds of osquery or YARA tasks to narrow down the affected endpoint scope. Task names can now be customized to easily distinguish between multiple rounds of task results. Agentic SIEM & XDR → Forensics © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
